# 1. Create a graph that shows the distribution of monthly income.

Load libraries

```{r  include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(forcats)
library(RColorBrewer)
library(knitr)
```

## Load Dataset
This dataset is from IBM which provide a standard HR dataset.

```{r}
load("attrition.Rdata")
```
